name: Regal Rexnord Corporation
description: Regal Rexnord Corporation is a leading global provider of electric motors, motion control products, and power transmission components. The company was formed in 2021 through the merger of Regal Beloit and Rexnord's Process & Motion Control segment. With a history dating back to 1955, Regal Rexnord focuses on providing innovative solutions to a diverse range of industries, including industrial, commercial, and residential markets. The company’s extensive portfolio includes electric motors, gearboxes, bearings, and conveyor systems, which are vital for manufacturing, energy, and various other sectors. Regal Rexnord is committed to sustainability, aiming to enhance efficiency and reduce environmental impact through its energy-efficient products. The company invests heavily in research and development to drive technological advancements and expand its product offerings. Its mission is to empower customers by delivering high-quality products and solutions that enhance productivity and performance. With a strong global presence, Regal Rexnord operates numerous manufacturing facilities and service centers worldwide, ensuring reliable support for its customers.
